description:
goprotobuf: use ReadMemStats since runtime.MemStats is not exported anymore

Revision 4696c572aaa6 unexports runtime.MemStats so use the new accessor to
get the number of mallocs.

messages.text:
Hello r@golang.org, dsymonds@golang.org (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

I'd like you to review this change to
https://code.google.com/p/goprotobuf

On 2012/02/09 10:28:49, dsymonds wrote:
> Thanks, but we're going to be dropping those lines entirely, and
> updating this entire package soon.

Fair enough. I had trouble building the tree, hence this patch.
If the new changes are going to take a while, I'd propose
applying this patch in the interim.

Thanks, but we're going to be dropping those lines entirely, and
updating this entire package soon.

subject: code review 5644066: goprotobuf: use ReadMemStats since runtime.MemStats is ...
